description: Numbers n such that sigma(n)/phi(n) sets a new record.
comments: Remarkably similar to but ultimately different from A126098. - Jorg Brown and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 06 2007
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..63 (terms < 10^12)
Jorg Brown, Comparison of records in sigma(n)/phi(n) and A018892
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {mse = 0; for (n=1, nn, se = sigma(n)/eulerphi(n); if (se > mse, print1(n, ", "); mse = se););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 10 2015
author: Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org)
extensions: Initial term added by _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Sep 06 2012
